game.name: Draft of Darkness
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Draft of Darkness is a survival horror RPG with deck building and roguelike dungeon exploration. Recruit allies, synergize their decks to create powerful card combos. Manage your limited resources and explore procedurally generated maps to determine the story's outcome.
